title: Participation and equity program
brief_description: Outlines the philosophy behind the Participation and Equity Program and provides an overview of the ways in which some schools throughout Australia are implementing programs that are attempting to come to terms with overcoming barriers to effective participation by students in education. Changes in curriculum, school research community groups, and the teaching of English as a second language are just some of the methods outlined. No other credits.
